title: # 445 - Jeff Dunham & ME
description:
Today I sit down with stand up comedian Jeff Dunham. We talk about moving to LA in 88’, his Tonight Show disaster, building his own helicopter, Ventriloquism, shooting a special during a pandemic and much more!  

You can watch “Jeff Dunham’s Completely Unrehearsed Last Minute Pandemic Holiday Special” on Comedy Central

This episode is also brought to you by Magic Spoon. Go to http://www.magicspoon.com/bert to grab a variety pack and use our promo code BERT at checkout to get free shipping.

This episode is also brought to you by Mercari. Start buying and selling when you download today from the App Stores or at http://www.Mercari.com 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your free visit.
